title: Treasure of the Golden Suns: Don't Give Up the Ship
description: Part 1 of 5. Scrooge McDuck is forced to take in his three nephews Huey, Dewey, and Louie, when their Uncle Donald enlists in the Navy. As they learn to get along, the mysterious El Capitan hires the Beagle Boys to steal a small wooden ship from Scrooge's museum, saying it is a map to a real treasure ship.

title: Treasure of the Golden Suns: Wronguay in Ronguay
description: Part 2 of 5. Having learned about the ship of gold, Scrooge and the triplets follow the map to South America, in a race with El Capitan, this time aided by Scrooge's archenemy, Flintheart Glomgold. Both parties are caught in the region's legendary Monsopies rainstorms.

title: Treasure of the Golden Suns: Three Ducks of the Condor
description: Part 3 of 5. An expert examines a coin from the sunken ship and declares it is from the legendary Valley of the Golden Suns. Scrooge flies to the Andes mountains to find the owner of a twin coin, and one half of the map leading to the Valley. He is aided by his nephew Donald, on temporary leave from the Navy, and pilot Launchpad McQuack.

title: Treasure of the Golden Suns: Cold Duck
description: After Scrooge goes off alone to follow the ocean currents to find the other half of the map, Launchpad and the boys follow his trail to Anarctica, where they are captured by a city of intelligent Penguins. they receive unexpected help from the boys' new governess, Mrs. Beakley, and her granddaughter Webbigail.

title: Treasure of the Golden Suns: Too Much of a Gold Thing
description: Having completed the map, McDuck and Co. finally fly to the Valley of the Golden Suns. From outside they are stalked by El Capitan; from inside they are threatened by Scrooge's increasing greed, which leads him to recklessly risk all their lives against the Valley's booby traps.

title: Armstrong
description: Gyro Gearloose builds a robot that can do anything efficiently and effectively. Then it goes berserk and takes over Scrooge's empire.

title: Luck o' the Ducks
description: Webigail befriends a leprechaun cast out by his people. Scrooge inadvertently saves the little man's life, and, knowing that his people have to grant him a wish, demands that he be given their legendary "Golden Caverns" in return. When the little people scheme to punish Scrooge for his greed, Webigail and her friend must save him.

title: Where No Duck Has Gone Before
description: Uncle Scrooge forecloses on a loan for a movie studio. To improve it, he instructs Gyro to make the set for a space show, as real as possible. When he does, Huey, Dewey, and Louie go to space with their hero 'Major Courage,' where they are captured by aliens. How will they defeat the aliens and return home? Does 'Major Courage' have 'what it takes' when it is not an act?

title: Nothing to Fear
description: On a day when the McDuck family is trapped indoors by a thunderstorm, Magica DeSpell causes each of them to see living versions of their worst fears.

title: Duck in the Iron Mask
description: Scrooge visits his old friend, Count Roy, of the mountain kingdom of Montedumas, only to find that his evil twin brother Ray has usurped the throne, and thrown Roy in jail wearing an iron mask.

title: Much Ado About Scrooge
description: Scrooge and his nephews follow a trail to a remote island to find a lost play written by legendary playwright Drakespeare, followed by super-salesman Filler Brushbill.

title: Spies in Their Eyes
description: Donald is hypnotized into stealing the control module for a prototype attack submarine Scrooge has developed for the Navy.

title: Dime Enough for Luck
description: Magica DeSpell enchants Scrooge's nephew Gladstone Gander into using his supernatural luck to infiltrate Scrooge's money bin and steal his Number One Dime, thus cursing himself with bad luck.

title: Jungle Duck
description: A search for a lost silver statue causes Scrooge and the others to discover a jungle duck. Much to Mrs Beakley's surprise, the jungle duck is a Prince whom she was once a nanny to long ago.

title: Scroogerello
description: Scrooge is the servant boy for his evil stepbrothers and evil stepfather. His fairy godmother prepares him for the ball, where he falls in love with the princess. She is kidnapped! How will he rescue the princess before midnight?

title: Top Duck
description: Launchpad is terrified of making a fool of himself in front of his flying-ace family when all the McQuacks are to appear at an air show together. Launchpad is to fly Scrooge's experimental fighter plane, the Mc-X. But when the Beagle Boys sabotage his practice efforts and put themselves forward as its test pilots, the entire McQuack clan must bond together to stop an aerial assault on Scrooge's money bin.

title: Bermuda Triangle Tangle
description: After a cargo ship is lost in the Bermuda Triangle, Scrooge and his nephews travel there to discover the Triangle's secret and find the missing crew.

title: The Status Seekers
description: Scrooge realizes that he is not acting like a rich snob, which makes him unpopular among other rich people. He tries to raise his social status by acting rich, but the price of this turns out to be too high for him.

title: Sweet Duck of Youth
description: Thinking that he has become too old, Scrooge sets out to find the Fountain of Youth.

title: Magica's Shadow War
description: Magica De Spell's plan to magically use her shadow to retrieve Scrooge's number one dime backfires when her shadow overpowers her.

title: Launchpad's First Crash
description: After Launchpad crashes for a hundredth time, he and Scrooge remember how they first met (and crashed).

title: Home Sweet Homer
description: A witch from ancient times accidentally brings uncle Scrooge and the boys back in time, where they help a young king Homer to defeat the witch.

title: Duck to the Future
description: Magica DeSpell tricks uncle Scrooge and sends him 40 years into the future, in which she is in control. Scrooge must defeat her and return to his own time.

title: Down and Out in Duckburg
description: Uncle Scrooge is challenged by someone collecting an old guarantee. Who will help Scrooge after the way he treated them? How will he reclaim his former wealth?

title: Dr. Jekyll & Mr. McDuck
description: Uncle Scrooge uses a strange perfume he bought in an auction, which makes him go crazy. His nephews must find an antidote with the help of a famous British detective.

title: Time Teasers
description: Gyro invents a time-stopping device, which gets stolen by the Beagle boys. The chase after the thieves brings Scrooge, his nephews, and Gyro centuries into the past, where they are all caught by pirates.

title: Catch as Cash Can: Part 1 - A Drain on the Economy
description: Flintheart Glomgold hires the Beagle boys to steal Scrooge's fortune, so that Glomgold could win the title of the richest duck in the world, and an amazing prize that comes with it.

title: Catch as Cash Can: Part 2 - A Whale of a Bad Time
description: Glomgold tries again to stop Scrooge from being declared the richest duck in the world, this time using a stolen submarine.

title: Catch as Cash Can: Part 3 - Aqua Ducks
description: Scrooge must go to the bottom of the sea to recover his fortune, which was sunk in the previous episode.

title: Catch as Cash Can: Part 4 - Working for Scales
description: After recovering his money from the bottom of the sea, Scrooge has very little time left to deliver it to Macaroon and be declared the richest duck in the world. Glomgold and the Beagle boys will stop at nothing to prevent this.

title: Merit-Time Adventure
description: A sea monster is attacking ships, and even abducts uncle Scrooge. It's up to the junior woodchucks to stop the monster, but only one of them knows how.

title: Ducky Horror Picture Show
description: Werewolf, Dracula, and other monsters come to Duckburg for an annual convention, wreaking havoc on the town and on Scrooge McDuck.

title: The Golden Fleecing
description: Scrooge, his nephews and Launchpad must fight their way through harpies and a dragon to steal the legendary Golden Fleecing.

title: Horse Scents
description: Flintheart Glomgold bets against Scrooge McDuck on horse racing, in a hope of becoming the richest duck in the world, and he is willing to use any means to ensure his victory.

title: Duckworth's Revolt
description: After Duckworth is fired so he can find his own fortune, he and the nephews are captured and enslaved. How will they get back to Earth?

title: Ducks of the West
description: Scrooge's oil reserves are suddenly dried up. He goes to the land of the cowboys to find out why.

title: Pearl of Wisdom
description: A couple of thieves steal a huge pearl from Banana Island inhabitants and sell it to Scrooge. But the pearl turns out to be far more valuable than they thought.

title: Once Upon a Dime
description: Uncle Scrooge tells the story of how he made his fortune.

title: Dinosaur Ducks
description: Scrooge and Launchpad go to the Lost World to get a dinosaur for Scrooge's zoo.

title: Sphinx for the Memories
description: Donald is mistaken for an Ancient Egyptian ruler, known as the Garbled One, who's spirit later takes over his body.

title: Double-O-Duck
description: When a spy who looks exactly like Launchpad is caught, Launchpad is offered to impersonate that spy in order to foil an evil plot.

title: Micro Ducks from Outer Space
description: Tiny aliens visit Earth and leave one of their machines behind. When Scrooge tries to use this machine, he creates a very small problem.

title: Robot Robbers
description: Gyro creates giant robots for construction work, but Beagle Boys find another use for them.

title: Send in the Clones
description: Magica De Spell transforms the Beagle Boys into Scrooge's nephews and sends them to retrieve Scrooge's Number One Dime.

title: Lost Crown of Genghis Khan
description: Scrooge and his nephews must beat other treasure hunters and recover the lost crown of Genghis Khan from the Abominable Snowman.

title: The Right Duck
description: Thanks to Launchpad's stupidity, he and Dufus find themselves in a rocket heading for Mars. How will they get back?

title: Back Out in the Outback
description: Someone of something is attacking the sheep on the Scrooge's farm in Australia. He goes down there to investigate.

title: Sir Gyro de Gearloose
description: Fed up with just being considered a "Gadget Man," Gyro uses his time-tub to go back to medieval times to become a brave knight. However, his penchant for invention soon gets the better of him.

title: Raiders of the Lost Harp
description: Scrooge discovers the Lost City of Troy, in which he finds a magic harp. But his claim on the harp is challenged by Magica DeSpell and the Minotaur.

title: All Ducks on Deck
description: A strange creature who calls himself Phantom Blot steals a top secret jet in order to conquer the world. Scrooge, his nephews, and Launchpad team up with Donald to stop this evil plot.

title: The Curse of Castle McDuck
description: Scrooge McDuck takes his nephews and Webby back to Scotland, visiting both Cottage McDuck, and Castle McDuck. However, the locals are fearful of the castle, claiming a supernatural hound haunts the grounds.

title: Superdoo!
description: Dufus finds an alien crystal, which gives him superpowers.

title: Earth Quack
description: Strange underground creatures settle under Duckburg and cause earthquakes for fun. Scrooge and his nephews go down to stop them.

title: Magica's Magic Mirror/Take Me Out of the Ballgame
description: In the first part, Magica DeSpell tricks Scrooge with a magic mirror to get his lucky dime. In the second part, Duckworth becomes a baseball coach, even though he doesn't know a first thing about baseball.

title: Scrooge's Pet
description: Webbie has an idea to help Uncle Scrooge worry less about his money. However the pet causes more worry when it takes the new combination for the safe door.

title: The Money Vanishes
description: The Beagle Boys steal Gyro's teleportation device to get to the Scrooge's gold.

title: Back to the Klondike
description: Scrooge returns to the place where he started making his fortune, but finds more of his past than he expected.

title: Master of the Djinni
description: McDuck and Glomgold race each other to find the magic lamp of Aladdin, but finding the lamp turns out to be just the beginning.

title: Launchpad's Civil War
description: Launchpad is invited to participate in a reenactment of a civil war battle. He feels honored at first, but the honor turns out to be more of an insult.

title: Hero for Hire
description: After being fired by Scrooge, Launchpad is recruited as a movie hero, not realizing that he's being used by the Beagle Boys to rob Duckburg's banks.

title: Maid of the Myth
description: A group of vikings, who were cut off from civilization for centuries, attack Duckburg and abduct Mrs. Beakley. Scrooge and his team are off to the rescue.

title: Hotel Strangeduck
description: Scrooge buys an old castle and tries to turn it into a hotel, but the castle appears to be haunted. Or is it?

title: Duckman of Aquatraz
description: Uncle Scrooge is accused of stealing and sent to the prison from which none escape. What evidence can clear his reputation and will he try to escape?

title: The Uncrashable Hindentanic
description: Flintheart Glomgold gives Scrooge the challenge of turning a profit on the retired airship, the Hindentanic. However, when it looks like Scrooge may best him again, Glomgold prepares to sabotage the star-studded maiden voyage.

title: 'Till Nephews Do Us Part
description: Scrooge's plans to merge McDuck Enterprises with Vanderbucks Industries soon includes a proposal of marriage when he falls for CEO Millionaira Vanderbucks.

title: Time Is Money: Part 1 - Marking Time
description: Glomgold sells a useless island to Scrooge, but upon learning that the island is rich in diamonds, he gets it back by trickery. Scrooge decides to travel back in time to prevent this from happening, but ends up in the distant past.

title: Time Is Money: Part 2 - The Duck Who Would Be King
description: Scrooge tries to return to the present, after being stranded in prehistoric times. On the way he discovers stowaways - a cave duck named Bubba and his pet triceratops Tutsi.

title: Time Is Money: Part 3 - Bubba Trubba
description: After returning to the present, Scrooge get his hands on the diamond mine, stolen from him by Glomgold in the previous episodes. Meanwhile, Bubba tries to get used to living in the modern world.

title: Time Is Money: Part 4 - Ducks on the Lam
description: Scrooge still has to pay 10 million to Glomgold for the diamond island. Glomgold will stop at nothing to sabotage Scrooge's attempts to pay him.

title: Time Is Money: Part 5 - Ali Bubba's Cave
description: Scrooge has one last chance to pay Glomgold and get the diamond island, but he is running out of time.

title: Liquid Assets
description: Scrooge hires accountant Fenton Crackshell to keep track of his fortune. When Fenton hears Scrooge wants his assets kept 'liquid,' he ends up dumping the entire fortune in Lake Dobegone, where the Beagle Boys soon find it.

title: Frozen Assets
description: After recovering his fortune, Scrooge asks Gyro Gearloose to build a security robot, which ends up keeping even Scrooge away from his fortune.

title: Full Metal Duck
description: Gyro creates a wearable suit dubbed "Gizmoduck," which accidentally finds it's way into Fenton Crackshell's hands. However, Fenton soon uses the suit to become Duckburg's newest hero, much to the chagrin of the Beagle Boys.

title: The Billionaire Beagle Boys Club
description: The Beagle Boys manage to take control of Gizmoduck, and use him to make off with Scrooge's fortune.

title: Money to Burn
description: Scrooge tries to rescue his money bin from under the sea, but before he can get to it, the bin is taken away by alien robots.

title: The Land of Trala La
description: Scrooge has a nervous breakdown from all the money problems, so he sets out to find a mythical Land of Trala La, where there is no money. But running away from money is not as simple as it sounds.

title: Allowance Day
description: Huey, Dewey and Louie's plan to make Scrooge think it's Saturday to get their allowances causes a global crisis.

title: Bubbeo & Juliet
description: Bubba falls in love with a girl next door. Unfortunately for both of them, their parents are engaged in a petty war with each other.

title: The Good Muddahs
description: The Beagle Babes kidnap Webby for ransom, but then decide to keep her.

title: My Mother the Psychic
description: Fenton's mother is zapped by a TV set and gets the ability to predict the future, which quickly becomes a burden.

title: Metal Attraction
description: Gyro builds a robot maid and gives her emotions so she could do her job better. But things get out of control when the robot falls in love with Gizmoduck.

title: Dough Ray Me
description: Gyro invents a device, which can duplicate any object. But the duplication process has an unexpected side effect, which puts Duckburg in serious jeopardy.

title: Bubba's Big Brainstorm
description: Tired of being dumb, Bubba uses Gyro's Thinking Hat to become smarter, only to discover that he has more value as a prehistoric goon.

title: The Big Flub
description: Fenton uses one of Gyro's half-baked inventions, a levitating bubblegum, to make a fortune, but the success doesn't last.

title: A Case of Mistaken Secret Identity
description: Fenton longs for the recognition of his heroic deeds as Gizmoduck. The situation really goes out of hand when people come to believe that Gizmoduck's secret identity is Launchpad.

title: Blue Collar Scrooge
description: Scrooge gets amnesia and ends up working at one of his own factories in terrible conditions. Eventually, this makes him realize the error of his ways, and become a more generous employer - well, at least a little bit.

title: Beaglemania
description: When trying to steal the prize money for a Rock and Roll contest, the Beagle Boys sing a song titled 'The Boogie Beagle Blues,' and end up impressing the crowd and winning the prize money! They soon become a music sensation.

title: Yuppy Ducks
description: After Scrooge is quarantined, his nephews take over the business with disastrous results.

title: The Bride Wore Stripes
description: Ma Beagle pretends to be Scrooge's wife to get half of his money.

title: The Unbreakable Bin
description: Gyro invents an unbreakable glass, which Scrooge uses to protect his money bin. But the glass has one weakness, and Magica DeSpell finds out about it.

title: Attack of the Fifty-Foot Webby
description: Webby turns into a giant, after discovering a magic spring during an expedition to the jungle.

title: The Masked Mallard
description: To improve his public image, Scrooge becomes a superhero. But that gets him in even more trouble.

title: A DuckTales Valentine
description: Scrooge steals Cupid's arrows from an ancient temple, which attracts the attention of the Greek gods. Things get even more complicated when Scrooge himself falls under the arrows' spell.

title: Ducky Mountain High
description: McDuck and Glomgold are trying to cheat each other out of getting a newly discovered gold deposit. But they may not be the best cheaters in the game anymore.

title: Attack of the Metal Mites
description: Glomgold's scientists create mites that eat metal. Glomgold tries to use them to ruin Scrooge.

title: The Duck Who Knew Too Much
description: While being on an unauthorized vacation, Fenton must stop spies who intend to rob Scrooge, but he has to avoid being seen by Scrooge at the same time.

title: New Gizmo-Kids on the Block
description: Fenton's mother accidentally shrinks the Gizmo-suit in a wash, which creates an opportunity for Huey, Dewey, or Louie to become the newest Duckburg's superhero. But which one of them will succeed?

title: Scrooge's Last Adventure
description: Scrooge and Fenton embark on a most dangerous quest inside a computer to save Scrooge's fortune from a computer glitch.

title: The Golden Goose: Part 1
description: The mystical Golden Goose, which can turn anything to gold, accidentally falls into Scrooge's hands. Blinded by greed, Scrooge puts the entire world at risk.

title: The Golden Goose: Part 2
description: The Golden Goose goes out of control and threatens to turn the entire world into gold. Scrooge and his team have only one chance of stopping it.
